pr_title: Support setting options of boss in NettyServer

timeline.message: Support option and childOption for NettyServer
Fix line is longer than 100 characters

timeline.diffHunk:

    * ignore this value applications should consider it a hint.

timeline.bodyText: nit: can you rename this to childChannelOptions to avoid confusion?
